title: Welcome to My Blog
text:
Hello! Welcome to my personal blog. This is where I‚Äôll be sharing my thoughts, learnings, and insights about:

Machine Learning & AI: Latest developments, techniques, and applications
Engineering: Problem-solving approaches and technical solutions
Career & Growth: Lessons learned and experiences in tech
Life & Learning: Personal reflections and continuous learning journey

I believe in keeping things simple and focused. This blog is my digital notebook where I capture ideas, document learning, and share what I discover along the way.


I‚Äôll be writing about:

Technical deep-dives into ML/AI topics
Career insights and lessons learned
Tools and techniques I find useful
Thoughts on the future of technology




Feel free to reach out to me on Twitter or LinkedIn if you‚Äôd like to discuss any of these topics!
Happy reading! üöÄ

title: About
text:
I‚Äôm an engineer who loves building, learning, and solving complex problems. I‚Äôm driven by curiosity rather than allegiance to any single discipline‚Äîelectronics, machine learning, biology, physics‚Äîwhatever the problem demands.
I hold a degree in Electronics and Communication Engineering. My early work on autonomous robots gave me a foundation in systems thinking that I now bring to AI.

title: Ayush Thakur
text:
I‚Äôm an engineer driven by curiosity‚Äîexploring machine learning, AI systems, and the hard problems that sit at their intersection.
I work as Manager, AI Engineer at Weights & Biases (now part of CoreWeave), leading open-source integrations that help ML practitioners build complete MLOps stacks. Over five years at W&B, I‚Äôve specialized in LLM applications and evaluation, created courses, and written extensively about what I‚Äôve learned.
I‚Äôm a Google Developer Expert in Machine Learning and a Kaggle Notebooks Master.
When I‚Äôm not working, I watch anime, think about hard problems, and occasionally 3D print things.
